info.name: Delivery Backend API - By Role
info.description:
Complete API collection organized by user role.

UPDATED (Dec 1, 2025 - v2):
- OTP verification flow for delivery status
- Delivery Outcomes: PARTIAL_DELIVERY, EXCHANGE, PAID_RETURN, RETURNED
- Rescheduled Deliveries: DELIVERY_RESCHEDULED (separate endpoint)
- Return Parcel Tracking: Creates RTN-xxx parcel with original_parcel_id link
- Hub Manager actions: Mark Return to Merchant, Prepare for Redelivery
- Added: GET /pickup-requests/rider/my-pickups (legacy)
- Added: GET /riders/parcels/my-deliveries (legacy)
- Added: POST /delivery-verifications/:id/request-otp

query.description: Required for Admin, optional for Merchant (uses own ID)

request.description:
Get comprehensive merchant invoice summary including:
- Merchant info (name, phone, email, address, status)
- Parcel stats (total, delivered, returned, pending)
- Transaction stats (total invoices, paid, unpaid)
- Financial summary (COD collected, charges, payable)
- Eligible parcels for new invoice

query.description: Search by merchant name or phone

request.description:
Get list of merchants with unpaid DELIVERED or RETURN_TO_MERCHANT parcels.

Returns for each merchant:
- Merchant info (name, phone, address, status)
- Parcel stats (total, delivered, returned_to_merchant)
- Financial (collected_amount, delivery_charge, return_charge, due_amount)
- List of individual parcels

When parcels are paid, they will no longer appear in this list.

item.name: Mark Return to Merchant (Creates RTN Parcel)
03. RIDER APIs
Pickups (Pending / Completed)
item.description: Pending: Assigned pickups to collect from merchant. Completed: Parcels already picked up.

item.name: Deliveries (Pending / Completed)
item.description: Pending: OUT_FOR_DELIVERY. Completed: DELIVERED, PARTIAL_DELIVERY, EXCHANGE, DELIVERY_RESCHEDULED

item.name: Returns (Pending / Completed)
item.description: Pending: RETURNED, PAID_RETURN (after OTP verification, need to return to hub). Completed: RETURNED_TO_HUB, RETURN_TO_MERCHANT. Use delivery verification flow first to mark as RETURNED/PAID_RETURN.

item.name: Delivery Status Update (OTP Verification Flow)
Step 1: Initiate - DELIVERED (Already Paid - OTP to Customer)
Step 1: Initiate - DELIVERED (amount differs, with reason)
Step 2: Request OTP (if separate step needed)

item.description: Rider selects status  enters collected amount  provides reason if required  OTP sent to Merchant (or Customer for paid parcels)  verify OTP  status updated. Statuses: DELIVERED, PARTIAL_DELIVERY, EXCHANGE, DELIVERY_RESCHEDULED, PAID_RETURN, RETURNED
Requires RIDER role. Organized into 3 sections: Pickups, Deliveries, Returns - each with pending/completed tabs
